summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara
Review Date: 2020/07/26
Store: SIKEMAY
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
Review Text: I really wanted to like this. Unlike most fiber mascaras this didnt give me much volume or length. And it flaked off after a full day of wear. I really love the packaging. I think this may be ok on fake lashes but not so great on real or short lashes.
Review Title: Not a true fiber mascara.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
Review Date: 2020/07/29
Store: AIFAIFA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
Review Text: I like that it comes in a case. The colors are vibrant. No strong smell. Only thing that disappointed me was the light. I had to do one finger at a time, flip it twice under it's own time in order to get fully dry. The light did not extend to all my fingers without some odd maneuvering.
Review Title: Nice except the light.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000)
Review Date: 2020/08/14
Store: OLEWELL
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'}
Review Text: Have quite a bit of stretch. They didnt slip down the hair and they seem pretty strong. Love the multicolored ones, they were great to add color to different styles.
Review Title: Bigger than most but work great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
Review Date: 2020/11/19
Store: tiggell
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
Review Text: Did their job! Fit the finger well, did not pinch and weren't overly tight. Had just enough squeeze to it to hold the form on so instead of doing one at a time you can do multiple. Had no issues curing through the clip. I also used it to pinch the end of an acrylic nail as well and it worked nicely for the as well.
Review Title: Doesnt hinder curing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beard Brush, Comb, Scissors Grooming Kit for Men's Care, Perfect to Distribute Balm or Oil for Growth & Styling, Adds Shine & Softness Black Color
Review Date: 2020/11/23
Store: GROW ALPHA BEARD
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.4 x 2.3 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '300875400470 719279662702'}
Review Text: The brush is really nice. Did a great job at smoothing the hairs especially nearly the cheekbones. The comb was great for the chin and under areas to reach the thicker hairs. The brush has a good weight to it and is pretty thick! I did feel like, if the comb were to go through a bad enough tangle, it may cause damage. Works best with a little oil too!
Review Title: Loved the brush weight
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
Review Date: 2020/11/30
Store: pine
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
Review Text: These sparkles work best with the black as a base. The black is pretty opaque. best if used with 2 coats but ok if used with one. The polish itself was easy to spread. However, I noticed a couple of the glitters were a little runnier than the others. The sparkle polish was very vibrant. Havent had a chip all week. Cured fairly well.
Review Title: Sparkles are very nice
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Pack Portable travel bottles-30ml Flip Cap Reusable Bottles Keychain Carriers for Shampoo,Hand Sanitizer Refillable Keychain Sanitizer Holder -1oz dispenser bottle, Metal 6 Pack Buckle Include
Review Date: 2020/12/01
Store: SKYCY
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 5.16 x 2.2 inches; 7.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '653552483144'}
Review Text: My family really loved these! They're refillable and they hold a lot more sanitizer than I thought. The colors are vibrant and clear. The clip is sturdy and the bottles seem durable. You get a nice variety as well. I like that the caps are faced upwards instead of down like the ones at the store which means no leaking product. Works with (thinner) lotions too!
Review Title: Pretty and functional
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: CONBOLA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'CONBOLA', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '15.08 x 7.44 x 1.5 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '750226660013'}
Review Text: The mirror came with fingerprints and smudges on it. Looked as though it had been shoved into the box. Theres no directions or suggestions for setup in the box. Things were easy to remove and move around to customize. I just wish I hadn't have had to sit and scrub the mirror to get the prints off. They've obviously been there for a while. It prompted me to also sanitized every piece a little extra just in case.
Review Title: Came smudged with prints
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions 24 Inch Ombre Synthetic Hair Crochet Braids Kanekalon Long Jumbo Braids For Box Twist Crochet Hair (Orange/Yellow/Blue/Purple)
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: Belle Show
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Belle Show', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 10.2 x 4.8 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Bailishow'}
Review Text: Super pretty. Very vibrant. You get a ton of wefts for the price. I usually keep a single braid in my hair as a memorial, I loved the option of adding color. My daughter has thick blonde hair and this looked great on hers too, to spice up a day of wear. The only downside I had with this hair is how easily it tangled at the bottom as I braided it. It came with little colorful add ins and a hook.
Review Title: So pretty but tangled easy.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BELLA MODA Sponges Blender Puff for Powder, Liquid and Cream Makeup 4PCS Purple Beauty Blending Sponge Foundations Powders Wet and Dry Used
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: BELLA MODA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BELLA MODA', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Material': 'Sponge', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '823544676230'}
Review Text: Purple is my favorite color and these were so pretty. I definitely preferred to use them wet. Dry was a little rough. I liked having a multitude of these to switch between cream liquid colors. Was also nice to have the option to put a couple aside to wash and still having a couple left. I love the little container. Was nicely packaged. I didnt have any chemical smell with mine.
Review Title: Purple!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design
Review Date: 2020/12/28
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'}
Review Text: Nicely, and deeply etched. Loved the french prints most. You get a lot of holiday inspired choices. Easy enough to clean. I did buff my stamper to get a better stick. Overall, works well.
Review Title: Nicely etched.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JulyQueen Jumbo Braiding Hair Synthetic High Temperature Fiber African Twist Two Tone Ombre Color Braids (2-41 3pack)
Review Date: 2020/12/30
Store: JulyQueen
Average Rating: 2.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JulyQueen', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.52 x 9.76 x 3.11 inches; 11.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '778957703700'}
Review Text: Got tangled easily. The blue is super dull. I expected it to be brighter like the photo. You get a lot though so I guess that's a plus. Also has a very stringy feeling to it and had an odd packaging smell.
Review Title: Blue is dull.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has shown appreciation for products that are vibrant and functional. The portable bottles were noted for their sturdy clips and durability, effectively holding a good amount of sanitizer. Users valued the quality of certain hair elastics, highlighting their strength and colorfulness for stylish hairdos. The nail art supplies also received positive remarks for being well-etched and easy to clean, enhancing the nail art experience. Additionally, the user enjoyed the weight and effectiveness of a grooming brush, noting its smooth application on facial hair. Overall, vibrancy and practicality were key aspects that resonated positively across several purchases.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
There were notable disappointments associated with some products, particularly regarding performance and quality. Several items struggled with efficacy, such as the mascara that fell short in volume and flaked after a long wear. The nail extension light was criticized for its inadequate coverage, requiring awkward maneuvering during use. Certain hair extensions also drew negative feedback for tangling easily and lacking the expected brightness in color. The makeup organizer presented issues with cleanliness upon arrival, indicating a lack of quality control. These experiences suggest a pattern of frustration with product performance and packaging quality.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reveals a mixed landscape of satisfaction and dissatisfaction. Positive sentiments centered around vibrant, functional products like the portable bottles, colorful hair elastics, and effective grooming tools. These items generally met or exceeded expectations in practicality and aesthetic appeal. However, the user also encountered significant downsides, particularly related to performance issues with products like the mascara and hair extensions. Additionally, quality concerns, illustrated by the unclean state of the makeup organizer, highlighted areas needing improvement. As a whole, while some purchases brought joy and fulfillment, others led to frustration over unmet expectations.

target_interaction.title: Didnt work for me
target_interaction.text: I thought I broke it at first. I didnt care for the scent. Felt slimey to me. I have dry combo skin and didnt notice a difference when applied by itself. The blood effect is cool but then turns into a weird color once mixed.
